59596.title: Avengers (2016) #1.1
59596.description: The time has come! Their ranks shattered by Civil War, their spirits weighted down by a toll both personal and spiritual, Earth’s Mightiest Heroes must find the resolve to stand united one final time against their greatest foe! Captain America! Thor! The Vision! The Wasp! Spider-Man! Hercules! When the dust settles, not a one of these valiant heroes will make it to the final page alive! This is KANG WAR ONE!

textObjects.text: The time has come! Their ranks shattered by Civil War, their spirits weighted down by a toll both personal and spiritual, Earth’s Mightiest Heroes must find the resolve to stand united one final time against their greatest foe! Captain America! Thor! The Vision! The Wasp! Spider-Man! Hercules! When the dust settles, not a one of these valiant heroes will make it to the final page alive! This is KANG WAR ONE!

59597.title: Avengers (2016) #2.1
59597.description: More on the Secret History of the Avengers! A stranger has come to New York — and the Avengers may have to draft a new member to help them defeat him!

textObjects.text: More on the Secret History of the Avengers! A stranger has come to New York — and the Avengers may have to draft a new member to help them defeat him!

59598.title: Avengers (2016) #3.1
59598.description: Labeled “The Mighty Pretenders” by an unforgiving public, Captain America redoubles his efforts to revive the Avengers’ reputation — only to face an unbeatable foe.

textObjects.text: Labeled “The Mighty Pretenders” by an unforgiving public, Captain America redoubles his efforts to revive the Avengers’ reputation — only to face an unbeatable foe.

59600.title: Avengers (2016) #5.1
59600.description: THE SHOCKING CONCLUSION TO THE TALE OF THE ORIGINAL NEW AVENGERS! Avenger X isn't who she's been pretending to be! Will the rest of the Avengers learn the truth about her in time to prevent disaster? Don't count on it.

textObjects.text: THE SHOCKING CONCLUSION TO THE TALE OF THE ORIGINAL NEW AVENGERS! Avenger X isn't who she's been pretending to be! Will the rest of the Avengers learn the truth about her in time to prevent disaster? Don't count on it.

61373.title: Avengers (2016) #1
61373.description: The time has come! Their ranks shattered by Civil War, their spirits weighted down by a toll both personal and spiritual, Earth’s Mightiest Heroes must find the resolve to stand united one final time against their greatest foe! Captain America! Thor! The Vision! The Wasp! Spider-Man! Hercules! When the dust settles, not a one of these valiant heroes will make it to the final page alive! This is KANG WAR ONE!

textObjects.text: The time has come! Their ranks shattered by Civil War, their spirits weighted down by a toll both personal and spiritual, Earth’s Mightiest Heroes must find the resolve to stand united one final time against their greatest foe! Captain America! Thor! The Vision! The Wasp! Spider-Man! Hercules! When the dust settles, not a one of these valiant heroes will make it to the final page alive! This is KANG WAR ONE!

61374.title: Avengers (2016) #2
61374.description: KANG WAR TWO! The Vision is hell-bent on revenge against Kang and if the Avengers can’t hold the synthezoid back, all of history is in jeopardy!

textObjects.text: KANG WAR TWO! The Vision is hell-bent on revenge against Kang and if the Avengers can’t hold the synthezoid back, all of history is in jeopardy!

61375.title: Avengers (2016) #3
61375.description: Kang War Three ends in a most unexpected manner! The Firewall of Time has been shattered — and now the Avengers are faced with the dangers it held back!

textObjects.text: Kang War Three ends in a most unexpected manner! The Firewall of Time has been shattered — and now the Avengers are faced with the dangers it held back!

61376.title: Avengers (2016) #4
61376.description: “Kang War IV” begins! The Avengers turn the tables on one of their oldest foes by adopting one of his tactics, leaving Kang nowhere to run and nowhere to hide — except in the timestream itself!

textObjects.text: “Kang War IV” begins! The Avengers turn the tables on one of their oldest foes by adopting one of his tactics, leaving Kang nowhere to run and nowhere to hide — except in the timestream itself!

61377.title: Avengers (2016) #5
61377.description: “Kang War V” reaches its climax as the Avengers storm through time and space relentlessly to put an end to Kang’s menace once and for all!

textObjects.text: “Kang War V” reaches its climax as the Avengers storm through time and space relentlessly to put an end to Kang’s menace once and for all!

61378.title: Avengers (2016) #6
61378.description: "Kang War VI" concludes! The rules of time are fluid ? and when reality re-forms around the Avengers, not everything (or everyone) will necessarily be in the same place it was left!

textObjects.text: "Kang War VI" concludes! The rules of time are fluid ? and when reality re-forms around the Avengers, not everything (or everyone) will necessarily be in the same place it was left!

61379.title: Avengers (2016) #7
61379.description: The Infamous Iron Man joins the Avengers – or, to hear him tell it, they’re joining HIM. How will Earth’s Mightiest Heroes react to a reformed villain like Doctor Doom?

textObjects.text: The Infamous Iron Man joins the Avengers – or, to hear him tell it, they’re joining HIM. How will Earth’s Mightiest Heroes react to a reformed villain like Doctor Doom?

61380.title: Avengers (2016) #8
61380.description: Once and for all, the Avengers have to decide whether the Infamous Iron Man is friend or foe! It's hard to trust an "ally" you've been fighting against for years — but the Avengers will have to!

textObjects.text: Once and for all, the Avengers have to decide whether the Infamous Iron Man is friend or foe! It's hard to trust an "ally" you've been fighting against for years — but the Avengers will have to!

61381.title: Avengers (2016) #9
61381.description: SECRET EMPIRE TIE-IN! The most loved Avenger of all has now shown his true colors — and the Avengers will have to put their allegiances to Steve Rogers aside and fight the good fight! But for one Avenger, that fight is very far away indeed! Trapped in a nameless land, a timeless time, can Thor find her way back to the here and now in order to return to the struggle?

textObjects.text: SECRET EMPIRE TIE-IN! The most loved Avenger of all has now shown his true colors — and the Avengers will have to put their allegiances to Steve Rogers aside and fight the good fight! But for one Avenger, that fight is very far away indeed! Trapped in a nameless land, a timeless time, can Thor find her way back to the here and now in order to return to the struggle?

62507.title: Avengers (2016) #1.1
62507.description: AVENGERS (2016) #1.MU A MONSTERS UNLEASHED TIE-IN! A seemingly straightforward mission for Spider-Man takes an unexpected turn when Earth's Mightiest Heroes are caught off-guard by a monstrous invasion from the sky. An all-star lineup of Avengers battling behemoths in this over-sized spectacular that's a perfect jumping-on point for new readers and old.

textObjects.text: AVENGERS (2016) #1.MU A MONSTERS UNLEASHED TIE-IN! A seemingly straightforward mission for Spider-Man takes an unexpected turn when Earth's Mightiest Heroes are caught off-guard by a monstrous invasion from the sky. An all-star lineup of Avengers battling behemoths in this over-sized spectacular that's a perfect jumping-on point for new readers and old.

62766.title: Avengers (2016) #4.1
62766.description: The old order crumbles as Captain America finds himself unable to keep "The Mighty Pretenders" together as a team. But he has one ace up his sleeve - one you've never seen before!

textObjects.text: The old order crumbles as Captain America finds himself unable to keep "The Mighty Pretenders" together as a team. But he has one ace up his sleeve - one you've never seen before!
